message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to go that low. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to offer you a compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $925000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my initial offer.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $925000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and your initial offer.
